author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1762 Add the HttpOnly attribute to setting the authentication cookie to make sure the cookie is not available to client side JavaScript. Also, when extracting the authentication data from the cookie ignore empty values.

author: jbellis
msg: remove tombstones during non-major compactions when bloom filter verifies that row does not exist in other sstables
